message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $11,500, which reflects its true worth.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is significantly below its value.  I could meet you halfway at $10,750.  This is a very fair offer considering the benefits this product will bring you.
I understand that you think it's worth more, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you at $10,200, but that's as high as I can go.
